category.name: Fitness & Health
category.description: Gyms, personal training, nutrition, and wellness services

templates.label: Personal Training
templates.template: Want faster results with fewer guesswork reps? 1-to-1 personal training tailored to you—let’s start strong. {url}

templates.label: Weight Loss Program
templates.template: Lose weight the right way—structured coaching, simple habits, and weekly check-ins that keep you on track. {url}

templates.label: Nutrition Coaching
templates.template: Eat for your goals—practical nutrition coaching with easy meal plans and grocery guides. {url}

templates.label: Yoga Classes
templates.template: Find your flow—calming yoga classes that build strength, mobility, and headspace. {url}

templates.label: CrossFit Training
templates.template: Ready to level up? Scalable CrossFit coaching—stronger lifts, better engine, supportive community. {url}

templates.label: Marathon Training
templates.template: Training for a race? Personalized run plans, pacing strategy, and coach feedback to finish strong. {url}

templates.label: Strength Training
templates.template: Build real strength with smart programming and technique coaching—no fluff, just progress. {url}

templates.label: Group Fitness Classes
templates.template: Fitness is more fun together—high-energy group classes for all levels. Try a session this week. {url}

templates.label: Senior Fitness
templates.template: Stay active, steady, and strong—safe, low-impact fitness designed for older adults. {url}

templates.label: Kids Fitness
templates.template: Active kids are confident kids—fun, coach-led classes that build skills and smiles. {url}

templates.label: Rehabilitation Fitness
templates.template: Coming back from injury? Gentle, coach-guided progressions to rebuild strength and confidence. {url}

templates.label: Pilates Classes
templates.template: Stronger core, better posture—Pilates classes that improve control and mobility. {url}

templates.label: Boxing Training
templates.template: Hit pads, not plateaus—boxing workouts that sharpen technique and torch calories. {url}

templates.label: Swimming Lessons
templates.template: Learn to swim or polish your stroke—patient coaching for beginners to triathletes. {url}

templates.label: Outdoor Bootcamp
templates.template: Train hard in the fresh air—outdoor bootcamps that energize your body and headspace. {url}

templates.label: Wellness Coaching
templates.template: Simple habits, big wins—wellness coaching that fits your life and sticks. {url}

templates.label: Sports Performance
templates.template: Train like an athlete—speed, power, and conditioning programs tailored to your sport. {url}

templates.label: Dance Fitness
templates.template: Cardio that feels like a party—dance fitness classes for every level. {url}

templates.label: Flexibility Training
templates.template: Move better, feel better—guided flexibility and mobility sessions built around you. {url}

templates.label: Fitness Assessment
templates.template: Start with clarity—complete fitness assessment and a plan you can actually follow. {url}
